name: Cheezy Catchy
description:
On a strange planet, there are 2 living things, Mouse and Cat. 

The Cat tries to catch the Mouse and eat it. The Mouse can only run and looking for cheese. 

In this game you have control the mouse and capture all the cheese that falls from the space, catch the cheese as many as possible. 

Controlling the Mouse is easy, just tap the screen to change the direction of the Mouse. 

But be careful with meteors that fall from the sky, the meteor can also kill you. The more cheeses you can catch, the more meteors that fall from the sky. Enjoy the game, collect your best scores.
